tourpackage.name: Samal Eco Adventure with Davao City Tour
tourpackage.metadescription: For white sand beach lovers and freaks. A great way to see Davao city, its countryside, and the island of Samal. This is for the young at heart! Kids will definitely enjoy!
tourpackage.metatitle: Philippine Tours | Samal Eco Adventure with Davao City Tour - 3 days
tourpackage.info:
Itinerary

Suggested arrival in Davao: Before 12 noon
Suggested departure from Davao: 7 pm onwards

DAY 1 - AIRPORT PICK-UP AND CITY TOUR (6 HOURS)

  • Lon Wa Buddhist Temple
  • Upside Down House Museum
  • Chinatown And Magsaysay Fruit Market
  • San Pedro Cathedral
  • Bone Collectors Museum (not available on Sunday)
  • Museo Dabawenyo (weekdays only)
  • Running tour of Central 911
  • Duterte's House
  • Jack's Ridge
  • Shrine Of The Holy Infant Jesus Of Prague
  • Davao Crocodile Park
  • Tribu K'Mindanawan fire show (weekends only)
  • Check-in hotel after tour

DAY 2 - SAMAL ISLAND OUTDOOR AND ECOTOUR

Samal Inland:  

  • Paradise Beach Resort
  • Uraya Beach resort (swimming and lunch)
  • Monfort Bat Sanctuary (sightseeing)
  • Hagimit Falls (swimming)

Samal Island Hopping:

  • Vanishing Sand Bar (swimming)
  • Pass by Pearl Farm Beach Resort
  • Pass by Malipano Island
  • Taclobo Giant Clam Sanctuary (snorkeling)
  • Narnia Wishing Island (sightseeing/swimming)

DAY 3 - DAVAO COUNTRYSIDE TOUR (8 HOURS)

  • Hotel Checkout
  • Eden Nature Park
  • Philippine Eagle center
  • Malagos Garden Resort
    • Malagos Chocolate Museum
  • Airport Transfers

Inclusions

  • Airconditioned transportation
  • Outrigger banca for island hopping
  • One way airport pick-up 
  • Complimentary one way transfers from hotel to airport
  • Environmental users fee
  • Services of a tourist guide
  • Malagos Garden Resort and Eden Nature park day tour fee
  • entrance to the chocolate Museum
  • Meals:
    • Packed lunch for island hopping
    • Buffet lunch on countryside tour
  • All applicable entrance fees as specified in the itinerary
  • Optional: 2 nights Hotel accommodation of your choice with 2 days breakfast

Conditions

  • Guests will shoulder the hut/cottage rental fee at Hagimit falls
  • Guest will shoulder meal expenses not specified in the tour inclusions
  • Guests will shoulder the Aquasports rental fees at the resorts
  • Guests will shoulder the chocolate making activity fee at Malagos Chocolate Museum
  • Guests will shoulder ride fees inside Eden Nature Park
  • In excess of the alloted time, there will be an excess usage charge of
    • P350/hour for car/van
    • P1000 for coaster
    • P1500 for bus usage
  • For rates without hotel accommodation, 2 days breakfast is also not included

Extra notes

  • Standard check-in time of hotels is at 2:00pm
  • Standard check-out time of hotels is at 12:00 noon
  • Early check-in is subject to room availability
  • Charges apply for late check-out
  • This tour is exclusive - meaning we can not join you/mix with other groups
  • All rates are subject to change without prior notice
  • For big groups. kindly email us

hotels.name: THE ROYALE HOUSE TRAVEL INN AND SUITES

tourpackage.terms:
• We require 50% of the total amount as confirmation of your booking
  • Balance shall be paid 3 days before the tourdates or on the day of the tour.
  • Standard check-in time of hotels is at 2:00pm
  • Standard check-out time of hotels is at 12:00 noon
  • Early check-in is subject to room availability
  • Charges apply for late check-out
  • All rates are subject to change without prior notice
  • Room and destination blockings and reservations will be automatically be released if no deposit has been made on the option dates stated above
  • Blockings and reservations are considered confirmed only upon receipt of the deposit
  • In case of cancellation, a written notice to ETOURS must be written at least 6 days prior to arrival date. There is no guarantee that a full refund may be given.
  • All paid fees are non-refundable if cancellation occurs 2 days before your tour date.
tourpackage.responsibilites:
• ETOURS shall arrange land transportation and Hotel accommodation for the entire duration of the tour, schedule pre-arranged landmark visits as well as pay for all necessary entrance fees specified in the Tour Inclusions
  • Client understands that ETOURS shall be responsible only for making arrangements as a tour operator
  • Client will not hold ETOURS responsible and liable for any accident, loss, injury, damage to property in connection with any accommodation, acts of GOD, flood, strikes, civil disturbances, theft, delay or cancellation or change in the itinerary on the day of the tour
  • Baggage is at owners risk throughout the trip

This Agreement will be for the duration of the tour. In the interest of trust and friendship, both parties shall exert best efforts to avoid breach and settle all disputes amicably before resorting to their grievances before the courts of law.
